snippet: According to complaints filed in federal court in Manhattan this week, the defendants collaborated to send drugs like Ecstasy, Percocet, Viagra and Xanax to various parts of the country.
abstract: Six Bronx residents are charged with operating a prescription drug ring from inside a day care center; accused are said to have used the facility to store supplies of drugs like Ecstasy, Percocet and Xanax for distribution to addresses across the country.
lead_paragraph: According to complaints filed in federal court in Manhattan this week, the defendants collaborated to send drugs like Ecstasy, Percocet, Viagra and Xanax to various parts of the country.

headline.seo: 6 Bronx Residents Charged in Prescription Drug Ring
headline.main: 6 Charged With Running Drug Ring From Bronx Day Care Center
headline.print_headline: 6 Charged With Running Drug Ring From Bronx Day Care Center
